channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
i downloaded a RSC source, when i click runserver.bat this is what i get:
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/iwt1ee.png[/img]
and this is the fite itself:
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2e5plx5.png[/img]
Im a first time coder with RSC. So help me with this plz.
wrong section posted, but plz help!

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:26, topic:414167”][quote author=Wintercanon link=topic=516129.msg3750381#msg3750381 date=1315970844]

[quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=516129.msg3750071#msg3750071 date=1315960070]
Don’t act like your Mac is amazing when it’s easy as fuck to do it on other OSs.
[/quote]Macs are far from amazing haha. They’re basically only a benefit for media production. I use my Mac for Java development, but for C# or web development I use Windows. I also wouldn’t dare try game on my MacBook Air.
[/quote]So you develop Java on a Mac just because it comes with it?[/quote]My MacBook Air is so light, quiet and the battery lasts for a long time. It’s nice to just kick back on the lounge and program rather than sit at my desktop. My Windows desktop has JDK and IntelliJ IDEA installed as well, but preference goes to the Mac.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

[quote=“Aciid, post:14, topic:414167”]What is the source?

this is my run.bat

@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/quote]He said that he downloaded a runescape CLASSIC server source, so that bat file will not work with it.

Here is the one for rscangel that K09 posted to run the server (without ant):

[quote=“KO9, post:1, topic:353267”]For windows users:

set java_path=C:\program files\java\jre6\bin\java set RSCD=C:\RSCD %java_path -Xms128m -Xmx2048m -classpath %RSCD\lib\mina.jar;%RSCD\lib\pircbot.jar;%RSCD\lib\bsh.jar;%RSCD\lib\xpp3.jar;%RSCD\lib\slf4j.jar;%RSCD\lib\xstream.jar;%RSCD\lib\mysql-connector.jar;%RSCD\lib\hex-string.jar;%RSCD\conf\server\quests;%RSCD\rscd.jar rsca.gs.Server world.xml p2p yes [/quote]

Read full topic
